channel.title: Need help with editing
channel.description:
hi i need help with editing things i need to now how to change things in the game iv changed things in client.java but they dont change in the real game itself how do i make it change in the game also
thanks and have a great day :D ;)

item.title: Need help with editing
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

to learn how to change things in game, go to the mopar home page and search what you want to change. There is bound to be a TuT somewhere on it.

Also once you make the changes, you must close your runserver.bat, and then run compiler.bat, and then your changes will go ingame.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with editing
item.dc:creator: @twinpkk02 twinpkk02
item.description:
@twinpkk02 wrote:

Ok well this is really nooby but i will help you anyways. Lol first off you changed the things in client.java but you didnt compile it did you? To compile first turn off server then compile and then run server again. Then you have them in it.

Read full topic
